ObjectClass.Name: Squiddy (Sepi)
ObjectClass.Description:
SQUIDDY/SEPI: Biological light support specialist Lightly armored ground infantry Devastating fast splash attack vs air Rapid sniper beam vs ground
Progenerates octo and pharo units Morphs into Mound or Reaph

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3 (hovercraft), MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 35 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 40 , R 28, Sta A\Air: 40 , R 24, SR 4, Sta B-

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Morph: Reaph
Objective.Details: Defensive support building\performs tech tree upgrades\heals nearby units\launches plasma and chrono bombs\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Morph: Mound
Objective.Details: Stealth early warning building\extra wide visibilty radius\Toggles:\ Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Create base- and -pod-class units\when near another base-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Octo: progenerate Pharo(-pod) units\- Pharo: progenerate Octo(-pod) units

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Create base- and -pod-class units\when near another base-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Octo: progenerate Pharo(-pod) units\- Pharo: progenerate Octo(-pod) units

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS\Recharges Shields 50%
